item.description: Halfling Rogue Assassin ![[Pasted image 20221209174539.png]] Background escaped from prison once was betrayed by her friends (who didnâ€™t help her in prison or get her out) and by her boyfriend (who had another girlfriend when she got out of prison) Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[The Bean Bois/Avaaros]], [[The Bean Bois/Davaelor]], [[The Bean Bois/Heilar]], [[Reznak]], [[Runa]], and [[The Bean Bois/Tia]] and, newly also [[Sealion]]
